screenshots.caption: Screenshot of Nagios showing the mapping between Physical and Virtual machines
Screenshot of Nagios showing different OpenStack VMs group by tenant

name: IaaSMon
short_description:
Plugin for monitoring OpenStack infrastructure-as-a-service using Nagios. 

This plugin enables Nagios to adapt monitoring to physical and virtual resources by mean of the listened in the AMPQ OpenStack queue.
summary: Plugin for monitoring OpenStack IaaS using Nagios
